features: 1080p High Definition Video Resolution - The Cybertrack H4 lets your audience feel like they are in the room with you with 1080P True Color High Definition video resolution.

Video Conferencing - Compatible with popular web conferencing applications like Zoom, Skype, Webex, Goto Meeting and much more. Whether you are chatting with loved ones or doing business on a video call. With all these great features, you can easily record and transmit your videos to everyone!

2.1 Megapixel CMOS Sensor with Maximum resolution - This webcam features a true 2.1M CMOS image sensor that provides crisp, colorful and clear HD quality video and snapshot image at a maximum resolution.
Built-In Microphone - The built-in microphone provides you with remarkable clarity, to ensure every conversation is heard without the hassle of a headset.
body.description: Adesso’s CyberTrack H4 High Resolution Desktop Webcam features 1080p HD Video Resolution that allows you to record and share colorful HD quality video with fine detail. This webcam offers you broad Instant Messenger compatibility, so you can enjoy video conferencing with today’s most popular Instant Messenger applications. This webcam also includes an integrated wide-angle microphone that lets your voice be heard loud and clear, whether you are chatting with loved ones or doing business on a video call. With all these great features, you can easily record and transmit your videos to everyone .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleased with Purchase
reviews.reviewText: Pleased with camera, works as description says.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: really nice it works perfect also perfect size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars is exactly as described
reviews.reviewText: so far its working ok for my classes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Satisfies all your Zoom call needs.
reviews.reviewText: Worked so good, I bought another so now, I have one in my home office and one at work. Buy it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Microphone feature is way too quiet.
reviews.reviewText: The video for this camera is great. However, I have to use separate audio because whenever I use the camera audio people say they can barely hear me and it sounds 'tin-ish'.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ITEM!!
reviews.reviewText: This product is not worth it at all. It is absolutely terrible. I had purchased it for my college classes as many people do, and my professors could not even see a clear picture of me. It was never clear in the beginning and the sound does not work! Do not purchase!! A total waste of money, in my opinion. If you are wanting to speak to people through a webcam or even for a class, do not purchase this particular item. This camera doesn’t work at all as to how it is supposed to. An entire one star review! ⭐️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install, sits well on a slim monitor and has great resolution and sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price!
reviews.reviewText: Needed this at work for all of the zoom meetings. Worked exactly as described, and I would definitely order again.
The picture quality was decent at first, but after around four months of usage the output is really bad. So bad, it reminds me of my phone's camera from 2006.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When it worked it was great…I ordered it on the 6th of December, since then it has been sat on top of my monitor, connected to my PC. It’s now mid January and the camera is no longer detected by the PC.I need to jiggle the cable for the computer to see it and even then the picture is awful and eventually cuts out.This camera is either extremely cheaply made or I have a defective one and would like a replacement.

Quick delivery. Easy install (plug & play). Really good picture quality. The picture on the left is this camera (Adesso CyberTrack H4).At $84 it is much more expensive then the cheap camera but the picture is great.The grainy picture on the right is a $23 camera advertised as HD - Not.Should have just ordered the better camera and saved my time. The cheap camera is going back.As always - you get what you pay for!
Simple, works as advertised. Had to modify support for my use but no problem. For an inexpensive camera a good buy.

reviews.reviewTitle: good quality, not customizable in Windows 10
reviews.reviewText: Camera is good, not compatible with default win 10 camera editor though.
